column5: That's great Nick, he looks like you.
Thanks.  From certain angles very much so.  And from others he looks like his Mom.
Congrats, Nick!!!!
Congrats Nick!!
Lets hope so,for the kids sake.LOL
Thanks !
Very happy for u nick. Make sure you buy him a tiny floater suit for the nipissing g2g this winter...
Congrats on your little bundle of pent-up fishing fury... He looks like a keeper!  It doesn't seem that long ago when my three were that size, and now, they look down on me!
Congrats Nick. I'm gonna have to put a crib in my hut now.  Love the name too Alexander is my oldest boy.
Yes.  But you can still out fish them!   I think Kevin has one in his  might have to shack up there

One of the reasons we try to to conserve our fisheries and wildlife, is to one day be able to enjoy it with our children and grand-children.  Last night, that moment became one step closer with the birth of my son Alexander.  He is our first child, so we where expecting a battle in the delivery room.  BUT we where surprised!!  Mel (my wife) started to get cramps at 5am Saturday morning.  The contractions started to get bad around 6pm.  By the time we got to the hospital is was 9:30pm.  Alexander popped out at 11:30pm, 2 hours after we got there.  The doc was tied up in an emergency surgery, so no drugs for my wife  :stretcher:     Man oh Man, words can not explain the profound respect I have for my wife after witnessing this event.  :worthy:  I don't want this post to be all about Alex and my family.  I know there are a handful of members who are expecting any time now, or in the coming fall.  If you've got pics of your next generation fisherman/woman, please post them up!!  It's all about family right!!    This is Saturday around Noon.   This is literally 12 hours later.         I hope some more members with newborns post up some pics too!  Or anyone who wants to show off some photos of their kids enjoying the outdoors!!  Heck, we have posts where we show off our pets, cars, songs... Why not our kids!  I'm so pumped to teach him how to use a baitcaster
Awesome congrats
Congrats !!
So cute, Congrats man get em fishing next summer
Big congrat's to the both of you, that's what it's all about!
I was thinkin ice fishing this winter......?  But my wife said I have to wait till he's atleast 5 to go on the ice with dad
Congrats you guys !!!!!!!!!!!!!!! What a beautiful little guy. I think he has your hair Just kidding Nick. He`ll be out on thw water  with you in no time
This is what happens Nick when you move to the country , you get babes in the woods around the lakes , i thought you knew that ...... lol . Congrats to you and yours .
Fantastic Nick!......CONGRATS!   (This year for icefishing will be fine  )

Oh.. And here I thought it was the well water.  Work back the conception date, and it was the week we moved in to our new house in Orr lake.  Don't want to get in to details, but had been trying for over 2 years before that....
Thanks Simon!  I'll PM you my wife's cell number.  Maybe telling her with that nice accent will help ease her mind
Trying is half the f...no skip that, all the fun
Location Location Location ...... ....... lol .
congratulations !!! Very cute little boy!!! Enjoy every minute, i have 2 kids and they are awesome...the only problem...they grow way to fast
No kidding were does time go  Seems like only yesterday    To "Dad Can I get a lift to the pub after this to drink beer and pick up woman
Congratulations Nick.  He's a keeper!
Congrats doooood!
Congrats to the whole family Nick. Glad everything went well.   I,ll have to stop by for a visit.   Cheers.
Congratulations to you and Mel. You've both embarked on quite the adventure....it'll be a wonderful life. Thanks for sharing your joy.
You know what they say.  If you have a son, you only have to worry about 1 dick.  If you have a daughter, you have to worry about thousands.
Congrats to you both !  Five wks left for us !
Congrats on the little one. Theres no better feeling.
Congratulations. All the best with the newest member!

Congrats Nick!
